pr_title: core: Fix migrating deframer compatibility with RetriableStream

Fixes #7168

interop-testing: Add integration test for RetriableStream

core: Fix migrating deframer compatibility with RetriableStream

timeline.bodyText: This is an API breaking change. Users of io.grpc:grpc-nterop-testing implementing their own interop tests (testing custom transport or server implementation) are breaking.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: I would like to make it non-abstract but throw unsupported exception.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: interop-testing has no API guarantees. As far as I'm concerned we only publish it so the command-line program is available.
replies.author: ejona86
